tool_description: This is an API showing all the live climate changes news from different  parts of the world
name: Climate Live Change
title: Climate Live Change

api_list.name: Get Specific Newspaper's Climate Change News
api_list.description: Get climate change news from specific newspapers from the web.

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news of climate changes all over the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-live-change.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-live-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-live-change.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-live-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
